rooms.description: A spacious area leading to the courtyard and living areas with ample natural light.
An open-concept living space with floor-to-ceiling windows offering a scenic view of the central courtyard.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen with efficient layout and ample storage integrated with adjoining dining area.
Private bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom, designed following Vastu principles for energy flow and tranquility.
Secondary bedroom placed optimally to maintain privacy while aligning with central courtyard views.
Additional bedroom ensuring comfortable space for family members.
An open-air courtyard that serves as a focal point of the house design, promoting natural ventilation and light.
A compact bathroom suite designed for practicality and ease of access.

openings.location: Between Entrance Hall and Living Room
openings.description: Wide door facilitating easy movement between spaces.
Floor-to-ceiling window enhancing natural light and offering expansive view of the courtyard.
Large windows that allow for bright interiors and open view to the courtyard.
Door ensuring privacy between bedroom and en-suite bathroom.
